mapper.insert: insert into hms_payment(imp_uid, buyer_email, buyer_name, paid_amount, buyer_date, buyer_time, adult, teen, sumticket,seats) values(#{imp_uid}, #{buyer_email}, #{buyer_name}, #{paid_amount}, #{buyer_date}, #{buyer_time}, #{adult}, #{teen}, #{sumticket},#{seats})
mapper.select: select payment_id, imp_uid, buyer_email, buyer_name, paid_amount, buyer_date, buyer_time, adult, teen, sumticket, p.created_date from hms_mem m inner join hms_payment p on m.email = p.buyer_email where p.buyer_email = #{user.email} order by payment_id desc
select payment_id, imp_uid, buyer_email, buyer_name, paid_amount, buyer_date, buyer_time, adult, teen, sumticket, created_date, seats from hms_payment
select payment_id, imp_uid, buyer_email, buyer_name, paid_amount, buyer_date, buyer_time, adult, teen, sumticket, created_date from hms_payment where buyer_email=#{buyerEmail}
SELECT t.time_slot, (total_seats - t.booked_seats) AS seats_remaining FROM time_slots t;
